sentence: CLARK COUNTY, Ohio (WDTN) – With Clark County’s COVID-19 cases sitting at the highest ever in the pandemic, Clark County’s Combined Health District (CCCHD) workers are getting help under the direction of Ohio Governor Mike DeWine from Ohio National Guard members.
author: Madeline Ashley
title: Ohio National Guard helping Clark Co. Combined Health District

author: Titus Wu
title: Half of Ohio National Guard members deployed to COVID-overwhelmed hospitals return home

sentence: COLUMBUS—Ohio Governor Mike DeWine today sent a letter to state and local law enforcement agencies in Ohio requesting information on any surplus or expired personal protective gear that could potentially be donated to Ukraine.
author: Portsmouth Daily Times
title: DeWine, Ohio National Guard request law enforcement inventory of donatable personal protective gear

sentence: OHIO, USA — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine is extending Ohio resources to military members in Ukraine.
author: WKYC Staff
title: Ohio National Guard to provide support to Ukraine

author: Jen Steer
title: Ohio providing tanks, protective gear to Ukraine

sentence: COLUMBUS— Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced today that the Ohio Army National Guard will aid Ukraine by providing armored personnel carriers for use against continued Russian aggression.
author: Portsmouth Daily Times
title: Ohio National Guard provides support to Ukraine

sentence: For the Miami Valley Today COLUMBUS — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced this week that the Ohio Army National Guard will aid Ukraine by providing armored personnel carriers for use against continued Russian aggression.
author: Staff Reports
title: Ohio National Guard provides support to Ukraine
